form.page_subtitle: CWC Counselling: Mother's Health> Mother's Health1

field.name: Counsel mother to seek care at the nearest health facility, if she:
Has breast problems such as engorgement, sore nipples, or breast infection
Advise mother to eat well to keep up her own strength and health
Check mother’s immunisation status and give her Tetanus & Diphtheria (TD) if needed
Give pregnant women IPT for malaria, if necessary
Advise mother to seek counseling for:
Encourage mother to know her own HIV status, and to seek HIV testing if she does not know her status or is concerned about the possibility of HIV in herself or her family
